item.title: Golang - How to create simple HTTP server
item.description: package main import "fmt" import "net/http" type greetingHandler struct { greeting rune } func (gh *greetingHandler) ServeHTTP(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { smile := 'ðŸ˜€' greeting := greetingHandler{smile} fmt.Fprintf(w, "<h1>%c</h1>", greeting.greeting ) } func main(){ fmt.Println("Hello!!!") http.Handle("/foo", new(greetingHandler)) http.ListenAndServe(":8080", nil) }
